column3: We wanted to kiss at midnight, but nobody else is going to so y'know…
All right, I'll take care of it
Who are you kissing at midnight, huh
Well you gotta kiss someone, you can't kiss your sister
Well, who's gonna kiss my sister
Dude-dude, who would you rather have kiss your sister, me or Chandler
Oh well, since I have that whole history with Rachel, I guess Phoebe
Ross wants to kiss you at midnight
It's so obvious, why doesn't he just ask
Listen, I'm gonna kiss you at midnight
You can't kiss Ross you got the history
Who would you rather have kiss you, me or Chandler
So did that do anything for ya
I'm gonna go out on a limb and say no divorces in '99
But your divorce isn't even final yet
Y'know what, I am gonna be happy this year
I am gonna make myself happy
Do you want us to leave the room, or
Everyday I am gonna do one thing that I haven't done before
That my friends is my New Year's resolution
Mine is to pilot a commercial jet
Now all you have to do is find a planeload of people who's resolution is to plummet to their deaths
Maybe your resolution is to not make fun of your friends, especially the ones who may soon be flying you to Europe for free on their own plane
She has a better chance of sprouting wings and flying up your nose than you do of not making fun of us
In fact, I'll bet you 50 bucks that you can't go the whole year without making fun of us
I'll take that bet my friend
And you know what, paying me the 50 bucks could be the "new thing you do that day
All right, my New Year's resolution is to learn how to play the guitar
Well, y'know those special skills I have listed on my resume
I would love it would be great if one of those was true
Do you want me to teach you
Well, I taught me and I love me
And she's gonna be really needing these to keep an eye on that boyfriend, who, I hear, needs to keep his stapler in his desk drawer, if you know what I'm talking about
Hey Rach, maybe your resolution should be to umm, gossip less
Well, maybe sometimes I find out things or I hear something and I pass that information on y'know kinda like a public service, it doesn't mean I'm a gossip
I mean, would you call Ted Kopel a gossip
Well if Ted Kopel talked about his coworkers botched boob jobs, I would
I just asked that girl out
Is that part of your resolution, your new thing for today
Is there something funny about that name
No, I just think that maybe I-I'd heard it somewhere before
I-I have a date with Elizabeth  Hornswoggle
Ooh, this must be killing you
All right Pheebs, I am ready for my first lesson
Oh no-no-no, you don't touch the guitar
First you learn here,  then you learn here
Now, I don't know the actual names of the chords but umm, I-I-I made up names for the way my hand looks while I'm doing them
So then, this is Bear Claw
Okay, umm, Turkey Leg and Old Lady
What an interesting approach to guitar instruction
Y'know some might find it amusing, I myself find it regular
Hey everybody, Rachel was so good today
Even when I found out…umm, all right, well let's just say I found something out something about someone and let's just say she's gonna keep it
Ooh, you nailed the Old Lady
Yeah listen so, I thought I was getting better, so on my way home today I stopped by this guitar store and…
Did you, did you touch any of the guitars while you were there
Do you want to learn to play guitar
Does nobody else see that Ross is wearing leather pants
That's not what I had in mind
See, people like Ross don't generally wear these types of pants
Maybe there's something in that area
Oh see, I-I needed a new thing for today and there's this leather store that always smells so good and I thought to myself, "Wow,  I never really owned a good smelling pair of pants before
Okay, seriously, what do you think
What are you, what are you doing
To take more pictures of all of us together
I mean I really think it's the best resolution because everyone will enjoy the pictures
Well, everyone will enjoy my music as well
Oh come on, she wants to snuggle now
What is she trying to kill me
It's like a volcano in here
Okay, it must just be me then
That was just the pants on the couch
Umm, hey, do you, do you mind if I use your bathroom
Hey, my favorite part is coming up
Joseph, did you even study at all last night
Have you been studying the real names of the chords
No, but you're questioning my method
No, I'm not questioning it, I'm saying it's stupid
Y'know none of my other student thought I was stupid
Yeah, well, y'know maybe you just need to try a little harder
Look, maybe I need to try a real teacher
Andy Cooper, he teaches guitar and look ooh, there's a nice picture of him with a little kid and THE KID'S GOT A GUITAR
You go learn from your qualified instructor
But don't come crying to me when everyone's sick and tired of hearing you play Bad, Bad Leroy Brown
"Baddest man in the whole damn town
I can't wait to be with you
I'll sneak over as soon as Ross picks up Ben
I'll just tell Rachel I'm gonna be doing laundry for a couple of hours
Awww, y'know what your nickname is, Mr
No, I-I got really hot in my leather pants so I took them off but they must have shrunk from the-the sweat or-or-or my legs expanded from the heat
Look, I-I can't put them back on
Uh, do you see any like, powder
Good-good, okay, sprinkle some of that on your legs, it'll absorb some of the moisture and then you can get your pants back up
Umm, do you see any—oh, Vaseline
Ohh, I-I see lotion, I have lotion
Yeah, sure, spread some of that on there
They're still, they're still not coming on man and the lotion and the powder have made a paste
Well, I'm just—if the paste matches the pants, you can make yourself a pair of paste pants and she won't know the difference
Joey, do you have a minute
Uh, Rachel's here, so good luck man, let me know how it works out
Oh, Joey, I have such a problem
Oh well, you're timing couldn't be better
I am putting out fires all over the place
Joey, I have got to tell you something
What-what is it, what is it
Oh my God, it's so huge, but you just have to promise me that you cannot tell anyone
Yes, you do want to know
Look, I am tired of being the guy who knows all the secrets but can't tell anyone
And you're not supposed to be gossiping
I just can't keep this one in, so I pick up the phone…
Ross, umm, you've been in there for a long time
I'm starting to get kinda freaked out
Hey, can you turn the lights off
No, let's just leave the lights on
No, I can't talk to you
I don't have a fancy ad in the Yellow Pages
Look, Pheebs, I just, I wanna apologize for, for saying that your method was stupid and-and maybe ask you to be my teacher again
And-and I promise, I won't touch a guitar until you say I'm ready
Was the chord at least right…
We heard about your pants, I'm so sorry
This year was supposed to be great
But, it's only the second day and I'm a loser with stupid leather pants that don't even fit
Look Ross, Ben drew a picture of you
Oh, be-because of the leather pants
Ben doesn't think you're a loser, he thinks you're a cowboy
That really is something; that's really cool
Maybe I should get another pair
Ooh, y'know, they-they had some with fringe all down the sides
I'm gonna go kiss Ben goodnight
I can't believe he thinks I'm a cowboy
I would make a good cowboy
Okay, now that everything's wrapped up here, I think I'm, I'm gonna go do my laundry
Y'know if this shirt is dirty
I'm gonna go to the airport
I figure if I hang around there long enough, someone's bound to leave one of those planes unattended
Remember that big thing I was gonna tell you about
I'm not gonna tell you, but if you found out on your own, that would be okay and then we could talk about it
Well, then it wouldn't be a secret
So yeah, that would be okay
Hey uh Joe, would mind going over to Chandler's bedroom and get that book back that he borrowed from me
You want me to go over there now
Oh no, I can't tell you until you tell me what you know
I can't tell you what I know
Well then I can't tell you what I know
All right, how about I go over there and I will walk into Chandler's bedroom and I will see that thing that I think that I know is actually the thing that I think that I know
Oh my God, Rach, I've been dying to talk to someone about this for so long
Listen, listen, we can't say anything about this to anybody, they're so weird about that
I don't want to fly in the rain
Oh, I am going to go for a walk in the rain
Oh good, okay, I can't take it anymore
Better make it a spaceship so that you can get back to your home planet
And Ross, phone call for you today, Tom Jones, he wants his pants back
What are you dating a character from Fraggile Rock
